data.message: You just lost yourself a shit ton of fans, die hard fan since the beginning! Peace out! I lost respect!

replies.message: Lol you triggered loser
Well that made no sense at all, but good for you probably talking shit from your mom's house! Grow up.

watch out guys, Jeremy Sauve lost respect in Eminem. I guess I'm gonna throw all my Eminem albums away now, if Jeremy isn't in then neither am I.

Wait, who are you again?
Liberal logic 101 if you don't agree with me I'll talk shit to you instead of just simply agree to disagree.

I've always loved Marshall. And I don't mind if he has 100% different beliefs than me. I always respected him (even if I disagreed with him, because I love his artistry). It's just so disappointing to know that due to the differing opinions, I am not welcome to be his fan now. To tell your fans that love you "fuck you"....that's the only part I care about. You can't watch TV, movies or listen to music now without hearing about politics. Seriously disappointing. 😔
byeeeeeeeee bye
eminem doesnt want fans like you anyways dingaling>>>he speak and rhymes TRUTHS not fake news folks!!

Jeremy Sauve just pointing out that your comment is pointless because no one knows who you are and no one cares if you dont like it. but it's funny, you calling me a liberal as a way to talk shit about me when you know nothing about me. little hypocritical, huh?
So since you don't know me, means nobody knows me. That is interesting! My point exactly!
but you were ok with him bashing Bush?   GET OUTTA HERE
Newsflash, I don’t think he cares.
Byyyyye 👋🏼
Jeremy Sauve Liberal logic?  exactly what you are doing isn't it with Em ? I guess that must be conservative logic then hypocrisy 101.🤔🙄
here i fixed it 'you just lost yourself a ton of shit fans'
LMFAOOOO he just told you everything wrong with our government. And btw ignorant people cant respect art anyways. Your views dont matter
https://media.tenor.com/images/acd1b35d7c1ce19df1b398d2e19f204f/tenor.gif
Lmao. He'll be okay. He also gained a lot of fans from this, so, it'll balance out I'm sure.
What happens next? You  stomp out and nobody cares?
You're a pussy.
Zero fucks given!!

Tou cant have been a die hard fan unless you accept what he's saying. First of all it's truth, secondly he's always been controversial and even had lyrics about wanting to see the president dead. Die hard fan of trump you mean, die hard fan of white supremacy, die hard fan of ignorance and stupidity.

Look at all the hatred spewing everywhere, I simply make a statement and so many people lose their minds! This is what is wrong with society today! I did not go crazy and bash everyone who wants still listens to him, I simply stated a fact. He will lose a shit ton of fans. It's the hypocracy that is causing divide, not the President! You all feed into the hatred without knowing the facts! Maybe just maybe you all should educate yourselves and use your own brain, not trust everything you read or listen too! It's amusing how 2 years ago these popular figures  praised Trump, but now that he is President these same people bash him! 🤔👍
